        public static HeaderSymlinkTree createHeaderSymlinkTreeBuildRule(SourcePathResolver resolver,

                                                 Optional<java.nio.file.Path> headerMapPath,
                                                 ImmutableMap<java.nio.file.Path,SourcePath> links)
        Build the HeaderSymlinkTree rule using the original build params from a target node. In particular, make sure to drop all dependencies from the original build rule params, as these are modeled via CxxPreprocessAndCompile.
